name: Crowdcube Investment Alerter
description: A script to monitor an investment page on Crowdcube.com, logging and alerting the investment pledged.

CC_URL.description: The full https URL of your Crowdcube page

POSTMARK_KEY.description: A valid PostmarkApp API key, or blank for no emails

SENDER_EMAIL.description: The sender email address - must be valid for your postmark setup
